item.title: Set up PHP 7 development environment
item.description: Setup requirements Install VirtualBox Goto https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads and download Virtualbox binary based on your OS. Install Virtualbox for virtualization Install Vagrant Goto https://www.
